DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the proposed project is to perform a clinical study in which volunteers will receive autologous blood transfusions in DEHP-free blood bags.
DOC.brief_title: Detection of Autologous DEHP (DiEthylHexyl Phthalate)-Free Blood Transfusion in Anti-doping
DOC.criteria: Have to fill the swiss blood donation formulary Anemia Cardiovascular disease Neurologic disease Not performed a blood donation for 5 weeks ago the start of the study. Immunological disease
